name: Digg Reader Like Old Google Reader [Righ-to-Left]
description:
Use this style to get old Google Reader style back in Digg Reader.
-------
This version is for RTL languages (Persian[Farsi], Arabic,Hebrew and Urdu)
- Add Tahoma font for contents
-------
For Left-to-Right languages (English, ...) Use This Version :
http://userstyles.org/styles/89924/
-------
